name: The End Was Nigh
description:
This game was meant to be part of the meditations project. After disagreements with how people should be credited for the project arised, the option to withdrew the game from the project was presented and I took it. You can read more about it on the devlog.

After that I made the game prettier and uploaded here. You can also download the original version, but it isn't as good.

The music is That Hopeful Future Is All I've Ever Known by Chris Zabriskie.

This game uses some hacks by Sean and Tracery by the wonderful GalaxyKate.
